Subsection.Text: The board shall establish by rule the collection of fees for the following purposes:

Paragraph.Text: License application fee: a fee not to exceed $100.
Examination fee: a fee not to exceed $300.
Initial licensure fee: a fee not to exceed $100.
Renewal fee: a fee not to exceed $100 biennially.
Reactivation fee: a fee not to exceed $100.
Inspection fee for facility: a fee not to exceed $100 biennially.

Subsection.Text: In no case shall the department charge more than the actual cost incurred for the implementation of this chapter.
